25.ara-name: كتاب الأطعمة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah: That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Indeed Ash-Shaitan has a sense of taste, for which he licks, so beware of him. So whoever spends the night with [a smell] on his hand and something happens to him, then let him not blame anyone but himself." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Gharib from this route. It has also been reported in a narration of Suhail bin Abi Salih, from his father, from Abu Hurairah, from the Prophet (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْبَيْتُوتَةِ وَفِي يَدِهِ رِيحُ غَمَرٍ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked To Spend While One Has A Smell On His Hand
